subject: BASEBALL
lead_paragraph: Chris Capuano threw seven shutout innings and drove in two runs to lead the visiting Dodgers to a 5-1 win over the Cubs on Saturday. Capuano held Chicago to three hits and struck out seven, extending his scoreless-innings streak to 18 2/3. His two-run double in the second gave him his first R.B.I. since Aug. 24, 2007.
snippet: Chris Capuano threw seven shutout innings and drove in two runs as L.A. defeated the host Cubs.
